values.key: View of Them by Neighboring Countries
values.alignmentText: Neighbors view Australia as stable and friendly, though dominant.
Australians see themselves as laid-back and fair-minded.
Points-based skilled visas and entrepreneur routes exist but are competitive.
Generally positive attitude toward Americans.
